heading: sweet dreams
subheading: hey, you wacky workaholic. been feeling out of sorts lately? cranky? forgetful? try lightening your work load and getting a good night's sleep. researchers at the university of chicago confirm that the lack of sleep can mess up your body as well as your mind, even hastening the onset of age-related illnesses like diabetes and hypertension. so tell the boss to stuff it, and go home and catch some zzzz's.
author: wired staff
text: hey, you wacky workaholic. been feeling out of sorts lately? cranky? forgetful? try lightening your work load and getting a good night's sleep. researchers at the university of chicago confirm that the lack of sleep can mess up your body as well as your mind, even hastening the onset of age-related illnesses like diabetes and hypertension. so tell the boss to stuff it, and go home and catch some zzzz's.
